name: MONOLITH (itch) (Team Fish, HappyBell, Hekate, jeolio)
description:
After crashing onto an alien planet, you see a strange monolith towering over you. 

Inside, there's something familiar and gravity is shifting with a push of a red glowing button.

CONTROLS:
WASD to move 
SHIFT to run
SPACE to jump
F to toggle flashlight
E to interact

TEAM FISH this time around was:
Kimi - programming
Arttu H. - 3D modelling
Joel - music, sound effects, 3D modeling
Hekate R. - game design, 2D art
extra BIG THANK YOU to Pazi for helping out in everything :3

This game was made in two months part of Pelifarmi in Oulu, Finland.
